title: DRAW_LINE_2D
content:
0xB856A90// DrawLine_2d
void DRAW_LINE_2D(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float width, int r, int g, int b, int a);Parameters:x1: First x.y1: First y.x2: Second x.y2: Second y.width: Width of line.r: Red.g: Green.b: Blue.a: Alpha.Like DRAW_RECT, but it's a line.
